product_name: Leki Cristallo Trekking Poles - Pair - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Built strong, yet light in weight, this high-strength, adjustable aluminum pole locks securely with a powerful Speed Lock mechanism that holds its length even under 300 lbs. of force.
short_description: Built strong, yet light in weight, this high-strength, adjustable aluminum pole locks securely with a powerful Speed Lock mechanism that holds its length even under 300 lbs. of force.
